name: Cardiac Imaging
subtitle: ECG
description: ECG is used for recording the small electric waves being generated during heart activity, a simple way of diagnosing heart conditions. In Padma Diagnostic Centre Limited we use Nihon Khoden Cardiofax 1350K for ECG.

name: Radiology Services
subtitle: X-Ray
description: X-rays provide imaging for diagnosing fractures, infections, and other internal conditions. Our center uses the latest Siemens DR System for high-quality imaging.

name: Laboratory Services
subtitle: Blood Test
description: Comprehensive blood tests for diagnostic and health assessment purposes. We use state-of-the-art equipment for accurate results.

name: Dental Care
subtitle: Dental X-Ray
description: Dental X-rays help in the diagnosis of oral conditions like cavities, gum disease, and jaw issues. High-resolution digital imaging ensures minimal radiation.

name: Diagnostic Imaging
subtitle: MRI
description: MRI scans provide detailed imaging of organs and tissues, aiding in the diagnosis of complex conditions. We utilize Philips Ingenia 1.5T for superior results.

name: Ultrasound Services
subtitle: Obstetric Ultrasound
description: Advanced obstetric ultrasound services for prenatal care, ensuring accurate and detailed fetal imaging. We use the GE Voluson series for clarity and safety.

name: Oncology Services
subtitle: Chemotherapy
description: Comprehensive chemotherapy services provided by experienced oncologists. Safe and hygienic infusion treatments for cancer management.

name: Ophthalmology
subtitle: Vision Screening
description: Detailed vision screening for detecting refractive errors, glaucoma, and other eye conditions. Advanced diagnostic tools ensure precision.
